Reviews.Title: “nice comfortable place”
Reviews.Author: ken44659
Reviews.Content: I enjoy staying here the staff are friendly and you get a clean comfortable room with queen size bed . I think its a good value for the money its a comfortable and decent place to rest. whenever there is an issue with something the supervisor/staff is always quick to accomadate me. I just like the place!

Reviews.Title: “Okay,Barely”
Reviews.Author: sisu44
Reviews.Content: RV broke down had to wait several weeks for repairs. Have stayed at Extended Stay Hotels many times, many locations.Have come to expect a consistent quality is important, with any franchise.. Apple Tree barely made the grade. Room comfortable,adequate amenities (cups,bowls,pots pans etc. no extra charge.),.Front desk was business center (fax, copies etc. no charge). Walmart Neighborhood Grocery a block away. Friendly staff. but took valuables with me when I went out..

Reviews.Title: “Walls were paper thin”
Reviews.Author: Cancun4EveryOne2
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel this past weekend. You could actually here the entire conversation of the person next door. Lastly, if your stay is not at least 7 days, you will get no house cleaning, i.e., sheets, towels, changed, they will not send anyone to clean anything under a 7 day stay and that was totally ridiculous. They also allowed animals and this was the worse I'd seen as one person had three dogs in one room. I asked the front desk, how does that go when they check out and she claims that they shut the room down for 30 days to be cleaned. Hard to believe though, and never again will I ever stay at such a place. Expedia never gave out this information and if you they would have, I never would have stayed there.

Reviews.Title: “Worst place I have ever stayed...”
Reviews.Author: mchic2008
Reviews.Content: With the exception of the friendly Hotel reception staff, this place is one that must be avoided. The hotel is cheap for a reason! I arrived at the hotel having travelled throughout the USA and stayed at many budget hotels along the way. This is by far the worst I have ever experienced. The hotel is located in a less than desirable area. There is barbed wire around the walls of the place, there was a car in the car park which had its window smashed. We entered our room via the back entrance which was full of rubbish. The room stank, it was filthy in the bathroom, dirt all up the walls and on the floor. The bath was also dirty. The carpet was covered in blood stains I didn't want to even imagine what happened there. The bed linen had cigarette burns in it, smelled awful and was dirty (and we were in a non-smoking room). The chair in the room was covered in stains and the heater didn't work. I did not feel safe at this establishment at all and would never recommend it to anyone. This truly is the worst place I have ever stayed (and I've stayed in a few dumps =/ ) please spend the extra money and stay somewhere clean and safe.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME PLACE & STAFF...CHEAP...PERFECT...I WOULD RECOMMEND”
Reviews.Author: qshahid
Reviews.Content: I am a very choosy person and doesn't believe in mess and noisy places. I stayed at "Extended Stay America -Apple Tree Dr" for about 3 months. I came to Memphis, Tn on a project in July-2010, all the hotels were completely booked, therefore I took a great deal of $599 + taxes /per month @ this place. The managers were really nice and friendly. I used to get room service on weekly basis where the staff used to change the bed sheets, vacuum the carpet, change all the old used towels with the new washed ones and clean the whole bathroom and leave it ready as new with alot of napkins and toilet rolls. All the people at the Information desk were always willing to help you in any thing you wanted, like telling you about places to visit in Memphis, and giving you the directions and stuff. I would love to stay here as long as my project is completed. Also I WOULD LOVE TO RECOMMEND this place to all you out there looking for a friendly, safe and decent environment with cheap rates. ;)

Reviews.Title: “Extended Stay America - Mt Moriah....DO NOT EVEN THINK ABOUT IT!”
Reviews.Author: NouraS0119
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel for my husband's business trip since he would be there 6 weeks. I couldn't find reviews online about this particular one...only the one down the street and everything seemed okay. TOTALLY WRONG! He checked in and said that it is a horrible neighborhood. Completely in the ghetto with drugs and prostitutes coming in and out all day/night long. BEWARE! I called the 800 number and they said that they get complaints about the hotel all the time and they are thinking about closing it. The lady was extremely accommodating and changed his reservation to the Homestead near the airport. Reviews on TripAdvisor were good about it and he checked it out and said it's a way better area. It's further from his business but worth the drive.

Reviews.Title: “D-I-S-G-U-S-T-I-N-G!!!”
Reviews.Author: phatboyArkansas
Reviews.Content: Me, my man and my 6 mo old needed a room in that area for just 1 night, i booked it through hotels.com, we arrived about 11pm, yes there were 2 security guards on-site which indicated to me they have problems, we got room 105 which was suppose to be non-smoking, as soon as we open the door, STANK hit me in my face, must and old cigg smoke, i wanted to complain/switch rooms but after traveling i was too tired. i killed 2 roaches in the bathroom, the kitchen floor had sticky stuff all over it, carpet needs to be replaced. So in the morning my man takes his shower i went into the bathroom and the water was up past his ankles, i'm like yuck, then i actually considered waiting for the water to drain so i could take a shower but once the water drained the ring around the tub was so black you could see it hadnt been washed in a long time, i did not take a shower, i dont live like that, i took a picture of the tub, showed it to the manager and got a refund, there was no way he could justify that. i feel bad for even subjecting my baby to the filth, i couldnt wait to get home the next day so i could scrub us down, it was gross. i stayed at ESA's before and it was nothing like this one. they should be ashamed.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here, unless you want to get robbed.”
Reviews.Author: purduein98
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for approximately 2 months after I moved to Memphis, awaiting my downtown apartment to vacate. At the end of my stay, my room was broken into and all contents stolen. They broke the window in an attempt to make it look like they went through it, but this was definitely and inside job. PLEASE don't stay here. The hotel did not reimburse me one penny for my loss (computer, suitcase, clothes, etc) or even offer a discount on my bill. There are better places to stay than this dump in Hickory Hood.

Reviews.Title: “Arrive early!”
Reviews.Author: babalootie
Reviews.Content: A potential disaster was averted when I was shown to my â€œnon-smokingâ€� room at 4 PM to find smoke worthy of a bar at midnight and a cigarette butt still floating in the toilet. A Hotwire bargain, I was told that my ground-floor request was unavailable, but after the butt incident, two ground-floor rooms were suddenly available. The difference was amazing. The first room, besides reeking of smoke, was really decrepit, even to the silver backing on the cheap stuck-on bathroom mirror having peeled off to 6 inches around the edges, the sink chipped and the bathtub horribly stained, I was afraid to look in the kitchen. On the ground floor, however, it was a whole different property, clean and new with decent lighting and smelling fine. The desk staff was pleasant enough, and the head of housekeeping even took me to inspect the new offering, which was a nice touch, apologizing for not having stocked the room with dishtowels yet. The iffy neighborhood has been upgraded with a new mini-mall, dubbed â€œApple Tree, â€œ therefore the ESA is now also Apple Tree. Better pick one of the apples on the ground. Thereâ€™s also a $5 internet fee.

Reviews.Title: “Our experience with.....”
Reviews.Author: OkieinMo
Reviews.Content: Our stay was for two nights. If the rate had not been so cheap (and non-refundable, we got both nights for the price of one), I probably would have been tempted to spend most of my one day looking for a different place. The room we saw online was far different from the one we got, but still roomy enough. It was fairly quiet and the staff we had dealings with were very nice, polite and provided everything we needed. The biggest problem was with the cleanliness, although it did not smell bad - I think they use a very strong deodorizer in the vents. The bath tub drain was broken so I did not try to bathe, then found out with a shower that the water drained so slowly that I could have bathed without a problem. No pool, no exercise room or arcade, but the a/c and tv did work and the bed was acceptable. It is listed as a 2 star and I think that fits!

Reviews.Title: “Not a good experience at Extended Stay Apple Tree, Memphis, TN”
Reviews.Author: wanderlust4700
Reviews.Content: The hotel needs major cleaning, lots of unidentified goop on walls of kitchen, oven filthy. A car alarm went off in the parking lot for over 3 hours, but there are no employees on site to deal with emergencies after 11:00 pm. It is also very loud and there are no elevators in the hotel, so be prepared to do lots of stairs.

Reviews.Title: “Noisy, Hairy, Drunk, Rude”
Reviews.Author: Magicmorningstar
Reviews.Content: People were coming and going all night, partying, and slamming doors. Very noisy. There was an abandoned car in the parking lot that looked as if someone lived in it. I did not feel safe there. People kept propping the security door open so their "friends" could come and go. My room was ok, but there was lots of, uh, "curly body hair" in all the dresser drawers. I used the handrail when I got in the tub and it ripped out of the wall with almost no effort. (I am not handicapped, but after the fall I took I could have been.) Elsewhere, things could have been much cleaner. I complained to the manager about the broken bathtub handrail accident the next morning, but he reeked of alcohol and did nothing. He was rude, drunk, and not interested in keeping me as a customer. I would never stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nasty, Nasty”
Reviews.Author: Anonymous021
Reviews.Content: Hotel is poorly maintained with extra sloppy housekeeping. Walls need cleaning and repainting, carpets need replacing. We stayed one night in a queen suite. The pullout couch had sheets on it that had not been changed from the last visitors!!! At 4:45 am, our neighbors in the next room either awoke to have an argument or just arrived home drunk to argue. They went on for over an hour. No one is at the front desk over night so there was nothing one could do except leave. We were so ready to leave by the next morning we practically ran out the front door... Won't be ever staying at an Extended Stay America Hotel anywhere ever again.

HotelInfo.Name: Extended Stay America Memphis Apple Tree
HotelInfo.Address: 6085 Apple Tree Drive, Memphis, TN 38115-0308
